website_summaries.verdict: A remarkably sturdy rod for such a low price, the fairly sensitive and lightweight Shimano is a good option for beginners, or as a simple budget spinning rod.
cons: Although this spinning rod is impressively affordable, it’s only available in 4 sizes

customer_reviews.title: Great Intermediate Skill Rod
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific rod, at least for anglers with moderate skills. I'm not a novice or an expert. I like the great feel this rod has as well as the distance it can throw tackle in the weights it was designed for. I used it primarily for bass fishing, but I've landed a nice sized sea trout with it too. The only improvement I can think of would be a hook keeper. But a line guide works in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bonness

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Says medium fast action...but way too flimsy for that rating...really wanted a shamano that was a 6 or 6'2 rod and that I could separate for travel...great service and no issues with return or refund.
customer_reviews.author: chuck reininger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rod
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these rods for 10 years before it finally broke when I accidentally hit it against a tree. Absolutely awesome rod for the price. Great action and sensitivity. I had to get another one. They’re super durable. If you need a rod that can withstand physical abuse and will last a long time, this is the rod for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rod
customer_reviews.text: Excellent two-piece fishing rod — it is study, well made, and sharp looking.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D Bell

customer_reviews.title: Best Fishing pole
customer_reviews.text: Love this pole. Indeed my favorite when I use spinning reels. Light, flexibility but strong. I will purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Kedwin Guillen

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This is approximately my 11th shimano rod.. I keep breaking them, my fault. Love em.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shimano 2 pc 7 ft rod
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for rods that didn't cost much, but also good. Well, finally found them. I bought two of these and they are just what I needed for speckled trout, flounder, actually, all inshore fishes. It is perfect for the type of fishng I do during the winter. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Dru

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great with 3000-4000 level spinning reel. I bought a 2nd...
customer_reviews.author: Darrell W Taylor

customer_reviews.title: OK for price
customer_reviews.text: This rod is OK for the price. Not great. Have definitely had rods of similar price with much more defined action. also, be aware that it has foam grips instead of cork, in my experience the foam tends to degrade quickly in the sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Rods
customer_reviews.text: Good value...I like these rods for SW FL flats fish...Dave M.
customer_reviews.author: David S Murray

customer_reviews.title: Shimano FX fishing rod
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 or 6 of these rods, they are a great rod for the money, My grandchildren use them when we go fishing. I use them with a bait casting reel, the kids use them with spin casting reels. I would suggest them to anyone who likes to fish.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's good
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a good rod ... can't really build a better one for this price point ... Has enough back bone for most of my river and small lake fishing
customer_reviews.author: Dean Q. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: amazing value.
customer_reviews.text: Great rod for the money Good action and sensitivity. I paired it with a Shimano Solstace matched for size and I could not be happier with a $40 combo. I have used it for saltwater fishing and it has performed well. I had a large skate on and it handled it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: mpan

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I would recommend this to anyone It ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I would recommend this to anyone It is a good medium action rod. I use it for saltwater fishing and it really stand up to the nig fish when needed. Also light enough for trout fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Richard McClere

customer_reviews.title: Good rod for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these for basic lake and stream fishing. Decent sensitivity and good casting distance. I did have to replace one rod when the tip got snagged on something and the top 4 inches immediately snapped right off, but overall I've been happy with them and at about $13 apiece it's really not that big of a deal if you have to replace one every once in a while. I have an Ugly Stik for saltwater, but the FX2 is my go-to for small to medium freshwater fish.
customer_reviews.author: Jon D.

customer_reviews.title: FXS
customer_reviews.text: Very Good Rod,Hi Quality with fine details and very Comfortable Price!I have combined w/ Shimano reel and they match perfectly.HIGHLY Recommendable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Tao

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good rod construction. The guides aren't the greatest, but for a Shimano rod at this price, it's solid
customer_reviews.author: Evan Schenker

customer_reviews.title: Shimano FXS 2 Piece Spinning Rod (6-Feet 6-Inch, Medium)
customer_reviews.text: Because it work great If it work I will like it I will recommend to my friends and my family
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: perfect. The balance is great
customer_reviews.text: Matched this rod up with an Shimano reel... perfect. The balance is great!
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Avid fishermen best rod for the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid fishermen, The rod has good action and easy to use, set up was very simple once I was on the water casting and retrieve was spot on, I'm using a Mitchell spinning reel love the rod,would recommend to any fishermen beginners or avid fishermen.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod
customer_reviews.text: Great rod at a great price. How can you go wrong? I broke it in on a nice red a couple weeks ago and then a bonnet head shark.
customer_reviews.author: Iread2much

customer_reviews.title: Just got this in the mail yesterday. It took ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail yesterday. It took more than a week to arrive but it seems to be worth the wait. I haven't used it yet but it mated well with my new KastKing model 3000 spinning reel. I can't wait to get out there, now that the fishing season has started. I'll try to provide a follow up when I've fished with it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: TPG

customer_reviews.title: great rod
customer_reviews.text: I have 8 ft versions and they are great. this rod appears to be built along the same lines and I will update if there are any problems. The action appears perfect for my fresh and saltwater needs. love guide inserts, prevents corrosion from older bare metal rings.
customer_reviews.author: smtireman

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This rod is a great purchase. Not terribly sensitive when fishing smaller pond fish but great strength for fighting along the river. Can't beat this price.
customer_reviews.author: RawDawginIt4LIFE

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The guides are not as advertised! Also, no hook holder. But for the price, you really can't beat it. Could be a good catfish rod. Maybe a saltwater rod for medium sized fish. Could be good for striped bass.
customer_reviews.author: YaoChing Y Saeteurn

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointed a couple bumps in the finished paint
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed a couple bumps in the finished paint, like droppings. tray to returned but to get the new one it will take like a month so I keep it because I needed it for a fishing trip I already have plan
customer_reviews.author: francisco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rod especially for the money. The length is so nice with casting into those difficult spots.
customer_reviews.author: John Stone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little rod for the money.  Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little rod for the money. Fast delivery. Good value. Price is right, you can't go wrong for a nice little fishing rod for $15.00 with shipping included.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Fish, fish, fish!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! Fast shipping and Shimano quality at a very good price. Being an Amazon Prime member has it's advantages. One of my fishing pals asked me to go ahead and order him one as well. Purchase with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: USMarine

customer_reviews.title: great look
customer_reviews.text: looks great and can't wait to go fishing and really see how it handles from my old shimano rod that was very good at pike and bass.
customer_reviews.author: rdllf

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty yet has a sensitive tip. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: good quality rod.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her pole. Better than mine. Got a shimano reel to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Rod and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this rod. If you are in the market for a 2 Piece rod, this is the rod for you.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Darden

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a basic setup
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this pole. I broke one and so I bought him a second one. He still loves them. Good value for a basic setup.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great rod at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Bought as a back-up rod for my dad and he loved it. Very light weight and durable.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: very good rod
customer_reviews.text: I like this rod fishing is better now with it icatch more fishes thank you for this great and cheap rod .
customer_reviews.author: Fatmir

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Rod looks nice,but was using it in cold weather and it snapped in-half. I expected better from Shimano. It was cheap and thats what I got. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ward

customer_reviews.title: U get what u pay for.
customer_reviews.text: More or less what I expected, no different than other 6'6" non graphite rod
customer_reviews.author: Michael d. duraj

customer_reviews.title: confusing
customer_reviews.text: I bought This Product for My Friend and It Is not What we Expected. the Description is Misleading And Confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Ali ALJOHANI

product_meta.title: SHIMANO FXS 2 Piece Spinning Rod
product_meta.description:
AMAZON.COM
Designed for anglers of all ages and skill levels, FX two-piece rods are built from durable aeroglass fiberglass and feature comfortable EVA handles. With solid locking graphite reel seats and reinforced aluminum oxide guides, the FX Series offers quality you can count on for all kinds of freshwater and light saltwater applications.

 

Specifications Model Length Power Action Line Rating Lure Rating Pieces Foregrip Length Reargrip Length Guide Number Handle Styles FXS60MB2 6 feet Medium Fast 6-14 1/8-1/2 2 2.5 inches 6.5 inches Tip+4 B FXS66MB2 6 feet, 6 inches Medium Fast 6-14 1/4-5/8 2 2.5 inches 7.5 inches Tip+4 C FXS70MB2 7 feet Medium Fast 6-14 1/4-5/8 2 3 inches 8 inches Tip+5 D
